summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York transmitting Ghislaine Maxwell's response to motions to quash a Rule 17(c) subpoena. The document is part of the legal proceedings against Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the legal correspondence; her legal team has filed a response to motions to quash a subpoena issued to her.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, transmitting Maxwell's legal filing from the Southern District of New York.

connections.description: Prosecutor transmitting a legal filing from the defendant in a criminal case.

events.title: Filing of Maxwell's Response to Motions to Quash
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team files a response to motions to quash a Rule 17(c) subpoena issued to her.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 23, 2021, from a federal prosecutor.
It transmits Ghislaine Maxwell's legal response to motions seeking to quash a Rule 17(c) subpoena.
The correspondence originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The attached filing is dated November 22, 2021, indicating ongoing pre-trial litigation in Maxwell's case.
